scripts.report:open: powershell -Command "if (Test-Path 'reports\allure-report\index.html') { Start-Process (Resolve-Path 'reports\allure-report\index.html') } else { Write-Host 'Report not found' }"
scripts.test:allure: cross-env ENVIRONMENT=prod jest --runInBand && node scripts/applyTmpAttachments.js && npm run report:generate
scripts.report:full: powershell -Command "& npm run test:prod:suite; $rc = $LASTEXITCODE; if ($rc -ne 0) { Write-Host 'Tests failed (exit code ' $rc ') - skipping report generation.'; exit $rc } ; $results = Get-ChildItem -Path 'reports\allure-results' -Filter '*-result.json' -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; if (-not $results) { Write-Host 'No allure result JSON files found - skipping generate.'; exit 0 } ; node scripts/applyTmpAttachments.js; npx allure generate reports/allure-results -o reports/allure-report --clean; Write-Host 'Report generated to reports\allure-report'"
scripts.report:ci: powershell -Command "npm run test:prod:suite; if ($LASTEXITCODE -eq 0) { node scripts/applyTmpAttachments.js; npx allure generate reports/allure-results -o reports/allure-report --clean } else { Write-Host 'Tests failed - skipping report generation.'; exit $LASTEXITCODE }"
